test_output_summary: N/A - documentation task with no tests required
implementation_notes: Created comprehensive documentation for the Graphiti context addition feature. This includes: 1) Command reference guide (graphiti-add-context.md) with all CLI options, examples, and use cases. 2) Parser reference guide (graphiti-parsers.md) documenting all available parsers (ADR, feature-spec, project-overview, project-doc) with detection criteria and metadata extraction details. 3) Deep-dive architecture guide (context-addition.md) covering system architecture, parser implementation, episode generation, and extension points. 4) Updated the main graphiti-commands.md to include the add-context command with examples and cross-references. All documentation follows the existing GuardKit documentation style and structure.
